NOVICE_LOW.name: Novice Low
NOVICE_LOW.oral_production: Limited to isolated words and memorized phrases
NOVICE_LOW.pronunciation: Strongly influenced by L1 and frequently interferes with understanding
NOVICE_LOW.communication_strategies: Depends on gestures, repetition, or L1 support
NOVICE_LOW.feedback_template: Your pronunciation requires development. You are at the earliest stage of language acquisition. Focus on building basic vocabulary and simple greetings.

NOVICE_MID.name: Novice Mid
NOVICE_MID.oral_production: Consists of short phrases and very short sentences
NOVICE_MID.functions: Include responding to direct, predictable questions
NOVICE_MID.discourse: Remains reactive and dependent on prompts
NOVICE_MID.grammatical_control: Errors frequent and often obscure meaning
NOVICE_MID.vocabulary: Limited to high-frequency items with heavy repetition
NOVICE_MID.pronunciation: Shows strong L1 influence requiring a sympathetic listener
NOVICE_MID.communication_strategies: Include repeating or recycling interlocutor language
NOVICE_MID.feedback_template: Your pronunciation handles basic needs and personal information, primarily with memorized phrases or simple sentences. Work on expanding your vocabulary and sentence variety.

NOVICE_HIGH.name: Novice High
NOVICE_HIGH.functions: Expand to basic survival tasks and limited question formation
NOVICE_HIGH.grammatical_control: Of present tense partial and unstable
NOVICE_HIGH.vocabulary: Adequate for immediate needs but imprecise
NOVICE_HIGH.sociocultural_use: Includes basic turn-taking and routine politeness
NOVICE_HIGH.feedback_template: Your pronunciation shows improvement, enabling short, predictable messages and simple sentences on familiar topics. Focus on connecting your sentences and improving grammar consistency.

INTERMEDIATE_LOW.name: Intermediate Low
INTERMEDIATE_LOW.functions: Include completing everyday transactions and initiating interaction in familiar contexts
INTERMEDIATE_LOW.grammatical_control: Functional for high-frequency structures with emerging past or future forms often inaccurate
INTERMEDIATE_LOW.vocabulary: Concrete and sufficient for daily life
INTERMEDIATE_LOW.communication_strategies: Include basic circumlocution and repair attempts
INTERMEDIATE_LOW.feedback_template: Your pronunciation is at a functional level, allowing for simple, predictable communication, asking, and answering basic questions. Work on organizing your discourse and mastering verb tenses.

INTERMEDIATE_MID.name: Intermediate Mid
INTERMEDIATE_MID.oral_production: Sustains sentence strings with emerging organization
INTERMEDIATE_MID.functions: Include initiating, maintaining, and closing conversations and asking a variety of questions
INTERMEDIATE_MID.grammatical_control: Strong in present tense with developing control of past
INTERMEDIATE_MID.vocabulary: Broad at high-frequency level allowing expression of personal meaning
INTERMEDIATE_MID.communication_strategies: Include rephrasing, clarification requests, and compensation
INTERMEDIATE_MID.feedback_template: Your pronunciation is clear enough to handle straightforward social situations and discuss details about yourself and your environment. Continue practicing past tense and expanding your vocabulary range.

INTERMEDIATE_HIGH.name: Intermediate High
INTERMEDIATE_HIGH.functions: Include narration and description across major time frames inconsistently
INTERMEDIATE_HIGH.discourse: Shows emerging cohesion with breakdowns under complexity
INTERMEDIATE_HIGH.grammatical_control: Sufficient for narration but unstable under pressure
INTERMEDIATE_HIGH.vocabulary: Varied and adequate for sustained familiar topics
INTERMEDIATE_HIGH.sociocultural_use: Mostly appropriate with growing register awareness
INTERMEDIATE_HIGH.feedback_template: Your pronunciation is generally clear, helping you narrate and describe in major time frames using connected discourse. Focus on maintaining consistency when discussing complex topics and strengthening your command of verb tenses.

ADVANCED_LOW.name: Advanced Low
ADVANCED_LOW.oral_production: Sustained at paragraph level with occasional lapses
ADVANCED_LOW.functions: Include narration and description in past, present, and future with some inconsistency
ADVANCED_LOW.grammatical_control: Strong across major structures with occasional errors
ADVANCED_LOW.pronunciation: Supports comprehension with minimal effort from listener
ADVANCED_LOW.sociocultural_use: Appropriate in most personal and public contexts
ADVANCED_LOW.feedback_template: Your pronunciation is understandable by most natives, enabling you to narrate and describe across major time frames and handle routine situations. Work on maintaining consistency in complex situations and refining subtle aspects of pronunciation.

ADVANCED_MID.name: Advanced Mid
ADVANCED_MID.functions: Include consistent narration and description across time frames and handling complications
ADVANCED_MID.grammatical_control: Strong across major structures with minor errors
ADVANCED_MID.sociocultural_use: Consistently appropriate across personal and public contexts
ADVANCED_MID.feedback_template: Your pronunciation is very strong. You can narrate and describe effectively across major time frames, producing coherent paragraphs understandable by most native speakers. Continue practicing in diverse contexts to reach Advanced High.

ADVANCED_HIGH.name: Advanced High
ADVANCED_HIGH.oral_production: Extended and sustained at paragraph level across all time frames
ADVANCED_HIGH.functions: Include consistent narration, description, and handling of unexpected complications
ADVANCED_HIGH.discourse: Highly cohesive and organized with smooth transitions
ADVANCED_HIGH.pronunciation: Fully supports effortless comprehension with near-native quality
ADVANCED_HIGH.sociocultural_use: Highly appropriate with strong register awareness
ADVANCED_HIGH.feedback_template: Your pronunciation is excellent! You can deal with unexpected complications in social situations, using abundant, detailed, and clear language. You demonstrate near-native proficiency.

SUPERIOR.name: Superior
SUPERIOR.functions: Include supporting opinions, hypothesizing, and discussing societal issues
SUPERIOR.pronunciation: Fluent and controlled with native-like quality
SUPERIOR.sociocultural_use: Accurate across formal and informal settings
SUPERIOR.feedback_template: Your pronunciation is exceptional, demonstrating fluent control and native-like quality. You can effectively discuss abstract topics and support complex arguments with sophisticated language use.

DISTINGUISHED.name: Distinguished
DISTINGUISHED.oral_production: Comparable to written discourse in sophistication
DISTINGUISHED.functions: Include persuading, negotiating, advising, and tailoring discourse to audience
DISTINGUISHED.discourse: Tightly organized and stylistically controlled with masterful use of rhetorical devices
DISTINGUISHED.grammatical_control: Grammatical and lexical precision at the highest level
DISTINGUISHED.pronunciation: Effortless and indistinguishable from educated native speakers
DISTINGUISHED.sociocultural_use: Culturally authentic and audience-specific with complete mastery
DISTINGUISHED.feedback_template: Your pronunciation and language use demonstrate Distinguished-level proficiency, comparable to educated native speakers. You exhibit complete mastery of the language with culturally authentic and sophisticated discourse across all contexts.
